topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Creating and Deleting a Volume Types

body.p: A volume type defines the characteristics of a volume. It usually maps to a set of capabilities of the storage back-end driver that is used for this volume.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Volumes link.
In the Volume Types section of the page, click Create Volume Type.
In the Create Volume Type dialog box, enter a name for the volume type.
Click Create Volume Type to confirm.
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Volumes link.
In the Volume Types section of the page, select the volume type or types that you want to delete.
In the Confirm Delete Volume Types dialog box, click Delete Volume Types.
